</usVsContinent> <featuredStories> <story rank="1" active="true"> <title>Europe — Midnight Sun to Mediterranean Heat</title> <text>From 24-hour summer light in the far north to sun-baked groves on the Aegean, Europe spans light, latitude, and climate in a single day’s flight.</text> <images> <image slot="1"> <caption>Midnight sun skimming a Norwegian fjord</caption> <searchPhrase>midnight sun
